metadata.title: The first RA MCU for motor control with USB FS interface

sections.content:
Question:
Are there any RA-T series products with a USB interface?
Answer:
The RA6T3 is provided with a USB 2.0 FS interface. In addition, it supports various other communication interfaces such as CAN FD and I3C for use in a wide range of applications.
Suitable Products
RA4T1, RA6T3
